phrases: I do not think it is too big of a problem.
Looks like he turned it off.
I am going out to look for him.
Looking for him without thinking first...
I still have loans remaining on it.
But, it looks kind of pretty.
And I bought a girl's bike for work...
It did not explode after the gas caught on fire.
Of course, it only happens in movies.
If it would just explode, it would be easier to let go.
You have got any money to call for a taxi?
But I wonder if we can even find a taxi.
You sure you two will be alright without calling an ambulance?
I do not think I am hurt...
Remember to file the report at the police tomorrow.
Well, all that matters is that you two are not hurt.
It is better to leave the ladies to themselves.
She is putting strange thoughts into Hiromi's head!
Hiromi and I really are siblings?!
There is no way this could be true, right?
Thank god you are not hurt.
Why do not you get a change of clothes?
That could not have happened, could it?
My clothes are all dirty now,
Th- Then... we will talk later.
But... you are acting weird, Mom.
Raigoumaru climbed up to the top of the hill.
It was a huge embankment, reaching 10 meters tall.
Looking from there, it seemed like the ground was the underworld.
Ground, who was there pecking at the feed, looked so pitiful.
Even if that is what Raigoumaru was thinking, his stomach suddenly started growling.
So in the end, he decided to call it a day.
Tomorrow, after filling his stomach, he will try to fly to the sky again.
Seems like i cannot fly after all...
Hiromi, what side dishes might you have today?
Taking others into consideration, how unlike Tomoe.
But, being the best friend of the main character in this school's shocking, big scandal can be devastating for a mere high school girl!
What should I do about your worrying?
That is exactly why I feel inadequate.
watashi no tachiba ga nai, could be translated I have no place etc etc, I think this is a fairly good translation of it.
I will at least pass on the latest gossip.
Right now, a staff meeting is taking place.
The subject is our school's prodigal basketball ace.
It is about one of the excels at the school, queen of the basketball team, beautiful, and pretty...
She, who is called beautiful and handsome...
Here, let us switch these for today.
You were at the site of Yuasa Hiromi's accident, right?
Yo, Nakagami, why do not you tell us...
Me and you... are friends, right?
I am heading back to the classroom.
We cannot help it, that is what the teachers said.
Captain Takaoka, when did you become such a rule-abiding person?
When you say she is suspended, you mean from tomorrow, right?
Alright then, please allow me to skip today's practice too.
I thought you would say that.
Why do not you go hang out with Hiromi?
Let us work hard for Hiromi and Tomoyo as well!
He said I love Noe... and he even wrote it down here...
Onii-chan said he got a week off.
Of course, after that accident happened.
There is nothing for you to apologize for.
Were you fighting for Yuasa Hiromi?
Hey, how is it going, Ground?
I have got more of the picture book done.
I was thinking about showing it to you.
Raigoumaru cannot seem to fly very well.
Raigoumaru eventually noticed it as well,
In fact, even if he would fly from a ten-meter tall cliff,
But, he pretends he does not know.
Why will not Raigoumaru face the truth?
It must be because he is afraid...
He is afraid to face the truth that he is only a chicken.
In fact, Raigoumaru knew from the beginning he could not fly.
You just do not know it yourself.
This is not the place where you take flight.
Just now, I came back from school with oji-san and obaa-san.
Ice... I bought ice cream with obaa-san on our way home.
I was just like an idiot.
I knew that nothing like that could have happened.
Something like you being my husband's child...
I showed you my most shameful side.
So that story was a lie?
I have been treating you too harshly...
I knew from the start that obaa-san did not like me.
It is because there is affinity between people.
But this has nothing to do with that.
To tell you to forget about everything up until now,
might be asking for too much, right?
Is it okay if I stay here a bit longer?
I used to listen to that a lot in the old days.
Thank you for worrying about me.
I have made up my mind.
That is what I am going to do.
It is drawing together, more and more... actually means fill/cover up something, but I feel like this is a more accurate translation.
I might be totally off, though :P
